# CSS Toolkit Base

Global resets to common HTML elements.

What it does:

* Applies `box-sizing: border-box` globally, using the inherit good practice method.
* Applies a global reset to all elements `margin` and `padding` via `*` selector.
* Applies a fix to Prevents iOS and IE test size adjusting on device orienttation.
* Applies a fix to Suppresses unwatched focus outlines on elements unaccessible via keyboard.
* Fluid image's unless any dimension attribute has been explicity defined.

## Configuration

Adjust the custom properties to change the base defaults using [postcss-custom-properties](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-custom-properties). For Example:

* `--body-color: #111;`
* `--body-bg: #fff;`
